extent: Companies that have poor employee relations tend to underperform, as do companies that pollute at a higher rate than their industry peers

extent: On the other hand, companies with numerous NLRB violations don't do worse than their peers and companies that sell your typical "sin" products (tobacco, firearms, gambling) can be excellent investments
